titleStmt.title: A short account of Sir Carbery Pryse's lead-work given in the first of June, 1693. by William Waller, steward there.
titleStmt.author: Waller, William, Gent.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. [2] reads: An abstract of the proposals of Sir Carbery Pryse and his present partners, concerning their famous lead-mines called Bwlchireskirhir, in the county of Cardigan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
